tool_description: Zloadr Professional API endpoints for real-time cryptocurrency & exchange & due diligence news. This category currently includes 8 endpoints:
name: Cryptocurrency Real Time News
title: Cryptocurrency Real Time News

api_list.name: Trade_Volume
api_list.description: Returns all cryptocurrency live news related "Trade Volume" subject .
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zloadr-zloadr-apis-v1.p.rapidapi.com/RapidAPI/live_news/subject/?name=Trade%20Volume"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-zloadr-apis-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
